00166 
00167 #define TRACK_SELECTED(track)               ((track)->flag&SELECT || (track)->pat_flag&SELECT || (track)->search_flag&SELECT)
00168 
00169 #define TRACK_AREA_SELECTED(track, area)    ((area)==TRACK_AREA_POINT ? (track)->flag&SELECT : \
00170                                                                         ((area)==TRACK_AREA_PAT ? (track)->pat_flag&SELECT : \
00171                                                                                                   (track)->search_flag&SELECT))
00172 
00173 #define TRACK_VIEW_SELECTED(sc, track)      ((((track)->flag & TRACK_HIDDEN)==0) && \
00174                                              (  TRACK_AREA_SELECTED(track, TRACK_AREA_POINT) || \
00175                                                 (((sc)->flag & SC_SHOW_MARKER_PATTERN) && TRACK_AREA_SELECTED(track, TRACK_AREA_PAT)) || \
00176                                                 (((sc)->flag & SC_SHOW_MARKER_SEARCH) && TRACK_AREA_SELECTED(track, TRACK_AREA_SEARCH))))
00177 
00178 #define MARKER_VISIBLE(sc, marker)          (((marker)->flag & MARKER_DISABLED)==0 || ((sc)->flag & SC_HIDE_DISABLED)==0)
00179 
00180 #define TRACK_CLEAR_UPTO        0
00181 #define TRACK_CLEAR_REMAINED    1
00182 #define TRACK_CLEAR_ALL         2
00183 
00184 #define CLAMP_PAT_DIM       1
00185 #define CLAMP_PAT_POS       2
00186 #define CLAMP_SEARCH_DIM    3
00187 #define CLAMP_SEARCH_POS    4
00188 #define CLAMP_PYRAMID_LEVELS    5
00189 
00190 #define TRACK_AREA_NONE     -1
00191 #define TRACK_AREA_POINT    1
00192 #define TRACK_AREA_PAT      2
00193 #define TRACK_AREA_SEARCH   4
00194 
00195 #define TRACK_AREA_ALL      (TRACK_AREA_POINT|TRACK_AREA_PAT|TRACK_AREA_SEARCH)
